segments.text: Good morning . Could you tell me the times of trains to London , please ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . There are trains at 7:59 , 9:18 , and 10:32 .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What time does the 7:59 train get to London ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What about coming back ? I'd like to come back at about 7 p . m .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: There's one at 7:10 p . m . and the next one is at 7:40 p . m .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Mmm , how much is a return ticket ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: If you get on before 4 p . m . or after 6 p . m . , there is a saver return which is 9 pounds . An ordinary return is 16 pounds .
segments.speaker: S2
